thread.title: Explore the world of philately at Foxboro Community Center program
thread.title_full: Explore the world of philately at Foxboro Community Center program

title: Explore the world of philately at Foxboro Community Center program
text:
Discover a national treasure on Wednesday, Oct. 1 at 4:30 p.m. – the Spellman Museum of Stamps and Postal History located in Weston, MA, one of just two philatelic museums in the United States! With its impressive collection of rare and historic stamps, engaging exhibits, and a wide variety of entertaining and educational programs, the museum is popular with both kids and adults. Siobhan Mahaney, Educational Consultant of the Spellman Museum, will be our guide as we explore the fascinating world of PHILATELY — the collection and study of stamps. Find out why millions of enthusiasts around the world are passionate about collecting these ‘little windows” into history, art and culture. This event will also feature a fun stamp trivia game and stamp giveaways! Let us know if you’ll be joining us, so please sign up in advance.
